net.myorb.math.specialfunctions

Class AiryFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.specialfunctions.AiryFunctions

  • public class AiryFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    support for describing Airy (Ai and Bi) functions
    Author:
    Michael Druckman

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AiryFunctions.Segment
      describe the segments of the spline, each to be computed with different algorithm

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AiryFunctions()
      establish Chebyshev polynomial coefficients collected by regression over domain -1:1 spline will use Clenshaw to compute results requested in this domain

        public AiryFunctions()

      • AiPosDomApprox

        public static double AiPosDomApprox(double x)
        Ai approximation for positive domain. not as accurate as Bessel but converges on larger positive ranges of parameters
        Parameters:
        x - real value parameter to Ai
        Returns:
        Stokes approximation of Ai

      • AiNegDomApprox

        public static double AiNegDomApprox(double x)
        Ai approximation for negative domain. not as accurate as Bessel but converges on larger negative ranges of parameters
        Parameters:
        x - real value parameter to Ai
        Returns:
        Stokes approximation of Ai

      • AiJ

        public static double AiJ(double x)
        Bessel Ai identity using Jp. used for domain ( -knot .. 0 )
        Parameters:
        x - real value parameter to Ai
        Returns:
        Ai approximation using Bessel Jp

      • AiK

        public static double AiK(double x)
        Bessel Ai identity using Ka. used for domain ( 0 .. +knot ]
        Parameters:
        x - real value parameter to Ai
        Returns:
        Ai approximation using Bessel K
